name: Bottle Flip vs Glowing Hot Knife Simulator
name_original: Bottle Flip vs Glowing Hot Knife Simulator
description:
Use your glowing 1000 degrees hot knife to gain points.
Cut the flying bottle in half to score.
Can you split the bottle in the two exact pieces?

Controls: Controls are very simple, just drag your finger over the bottle during flip to cut it.
Remember, the 1000 degrees hot knife cuts only exacly where you tap.

Extras: There is a hidden BULLET TIME feature in the full version of this game. Would you like to enjoy some real Matrix-like action and improve your quality? It's your chance!
